_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five emotional shackles [an9.82:2.7]: Passion and craving for sensual pleasures
The four right efforts [an9.82:2.7]: So that bad, unskillful qualities donâ€™t arise
So that unskillful qualities are given up
So that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
